src:
PODKAST: Van Bomel kao ubica tiketa, i zašto treba da igrate na italijansku odbojku
Novinari Sportkluba analiziraju predstojeći vikend

01 Nov 2019

Znamo da podkast „Iz keca u dvojku“ volite i jedva čekate da čujete analize Lazara Jovanovića i Nikole Jančića, novinara Sportkluba, za predstojeći vikend, pa vas zato nećemo mnogo zamarati tekstom.
Čućete, između ostalog, zašto je u prethodnom „velikom“ kolu pao PSV, ali i zbog čega bi italijanska odbojka trebalo češće da zauzme mesto na vašim tiketima.
Uživajte…
text:
Podcast: Van Bomel as a Ticket Killer, and Why You Should Play Italian Volleyball
Sportclub journalists are analyzing the upcoming weekend

01 Nov 2019

We know you love and can't wait to hear the analyzes of Lazar Jovanovic and Sportclub journalist Lazar Jovanovic for the upcoming weekend, so we won't bother you with the text.
You will hear, among other things, why the PSV fell in the previous "big" round, but also why Italian volleyball should take more place in your tickets.
Enjoy ...
